channel.title: Black pack for ranbow six vegas :O
channel.description:
as for the rumer that the black pack is only for pc, this is a load of crap, its now out on the 360 :O if u haventy got it yet and u own the game and xbox live then u must be lonaly on your server, most ppl now have this and its worth getting, read on my friend
If u play xbox live and wonder y u not getting many players in your rainbow six vegas server then try looking in the download section for vegas :O thay just bought out the new Black Pack for FREE! unlike the red pack its free fior all and it comes with a new new maps and the lvl bug fixed O.o meening from now on no newb high lvls....,
any 1 found any new bug fixes thay want to share?? i found a few.
1. the motion sencers dont go through most the walls thay ust to
2. thay fixed the wall box glitch on streets light / dark
3. the wall RUNNING glitch fixed
4. pending ^_^ tell me more,
allso tell me what u trhink of thwe new lvl pluss the new lvl ( the 1 from rainbow six !3!, gota love that game, owned all )
AAAAAAAAAAND any new bugs/ glitches on the new lvl
oh joy lol
sorry fopr the typost.... i cant type in the dark at 2am lol
